about_the_game:
Add Cut Capers - "Let's Start Again (Odd Chap Remix)" to your library!

Song Description:

Add Cut Capers - "Let's Start Again (Odd Chap Remix)" to your library!

Experience the familiar with a fresh spin as Cut Capers invites you to embrace the joy of starting anew.

Music Pack Description:

Grab your dance partner and jive back into the swingin’ world of Synth Riders for Electro Swing Essentials Volume 2, the much-anticipated sequel to the game’s very first DLC from 2020. Light up the night with nine new tracks, four of which are free for all to swing to, available in-game January 9th.

Since the release of the original Electro Swing Essentials, players have been begging for more of these toe-tapping tracks, and Volume 2 delivers! The team at Kluge presents premium music from fresh, new artists for the game, Little Violet, Cut Capers & Odd Chap, alongside new music from fan-favorites Jamie Berry, Balduin & Wolfgang Lohr and Swingrowers.

Paid Tracks include:
  • Guilty Pleasure - Jamie Berry (feat. Little Violet)
  • Boring 20s - Tamela D'Amico, Wolfgang Lohr & Ashley Slater
  • Magic Man (feat. J Fitz) - Balduin & Wolfgang Lohr
  • Let's Start Again (Odd Chap Remix) - Cut Capers
  • Rose - Swingrowers

Free Songs - Swing for all:
  • Keep You in Line (feat. Cissie) - Jamie Berry
  • Keep on Smilin (feat. Emma Lea & Ashley Slater) - Wolfgang Lohr
  • Watch Your Tongue - PiSk, Little Violet
  • Silent Movie - Little Violet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
